DOC.brief_summary: : Researchers would like see new test call SELDI ( Surface Enhanced Laser Desorption Ionization ) analysis predict biopsy result well PSA test .
DOC.brief_title: UCI 03-72 Prostate Cancer Detection Serum Proteomic Profiling
DOC.detailed_description: A blood sample approximately 30 cc collect prior patient standard care radical prostatectomy surgery . This blood use SELDI analysis . The remainder blood sample store may use PSA test later date . The patient final blood draw 3 month 1 year follow surgery .
DOC.criteria: For subject : Men 50 year age old . Serum PSA great equal 2.5 ng/ml less equal 10.0 ng/ml determine measurement within past six month , and/or digital rectal exam suspicious prostate cancer determine patient 's Urologist . It determine treat physician prostate biopsy clinically indicate . Patients already diagnosed prostate cancer schedule radical prostatectomy . For study treatment effect Men clinically localize prostate cancer ( total PSA < 20 ng/ml clinical T2b le ) . Men organ confine prostate cancer determine final pathologic diagnosis . Exclusion criteria subject : Known prostate cancer prior treatment prostate cancer . Acute prostatitis . Untreated urinary tract infection . Presence Foley catheter urethral instrumentation previous 48 hour . Hormonal therapy include LHRH agonist , oral antiandrogens , estrogenic compound , Proscar phytotherapy within previous 6 month . Exclusion Criteria ( study treatment effect ) Men nonorgan confine prostate cancer . Men detectable serum PSA level 1 month follow radical prostatectomy .
DOC.keyword: Prostate Cancer Detection Serum Proteomic Profiling
